WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed in r47012.  Note that Tier bonuses which aren't modeled will not show up.
WorkItem.Description: Not sure why, but the buff isn't ticked, and it didnt appear to increase the value of the threat from the extra damage from HoR.
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtPaladin] Doesn't count 2pc Set Bonus when equipped

Comments.Message: Firstly, please attach your character file so we can look into this.  Secondly, please specify WHICH 2 piece bonus you are referring to. :)

As far as I can tell, there are no t9 or t10 set bonuses for prot or holy paladins.  In the comparison pane under Buffs -> Set Bonuses, the only ones I see are Aegis Plate 4 piece bonus, Aegis Plate 2 piece bonus, and Redemption Plate 2 piece bonus, and it doesn't seem to place more value on a set piece when you are already wearing other items in that set.  I will attach my character file in case it's something I'm doing wrong, but it seems to work for my hunter and my wife's mage.
Please note this applies to ProtPaladin only.  I believe there is already an issue open for Healadin's set bonuses.
